original_title: Mo You Ji 1 Pan Gu Zhi Xin
overview: Lian Sha is an organization that aims to create a nation that mutants can call their own. To obtain more power, their leader Jialouluo (Luo Bin) has been continuously searching for the heart of Pangu. Tian Zhuyan (Lu Yujing), Lie (Yu Haorui) and Yan Liusha (Yu Lei) are three bounty hunters on a mission. They chance upon Jiang Liuer (Cui Can), the little monk whose destiny is tied to the heart of Pangu.
title: Biography of the Specimen 2 - The Heart of Pangu
